Name: Electrical Work, Scope Expansion
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding the scope of minor electrical work exempted from inspection.
RTF:
{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}

\v0\par
\expndtw0\ul Be it enacted by the Council as follows:\ulnone\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri144\sl480\slmult1\qj\tx2016\tx2736\tx3456\tx4176     \tab Section 1. Subdivision g of section 27-3018 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as added by local law number 73 for the year 1988, is amended to read as follows:\par
    \tab     \tab g.  \tab Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no inspection or inspection fees shall be required for minor electrical [maintenance] work. For purposes of this section, minor electrical [maintenance] work shall be any of the following:\par
    \tab     \tab (1) \tab replacement of defective circuit breakers or switches rated thirty amperes or less, excluding main service disconnects;\par
    \tab     \tab (2) \tab replacement of parts in electrical panels where voltage does not exceed one hundred fifty volts to ground;\par
    \tab     \tab (3) \tab replacement of elevator parts;\par
    \tab     \tab (4) \tab replacement of defective controls rated at thirty amperes or less;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri144\sl480\slmult1\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880     \tab     \tab (5) \tab repair of defective fixtures;\par
    \tab     \tab (6) \tab replacement of fixtures in existing outlets, provided the number of such fixtures does not exceed [five] \ul ten\ulnone  and does not exceed the existing wattage;\par
    \tab     \tab (7) \tab replacement, repair, disconnection, or reconnection of motors not to exceed one horsepower and associated devices;\par
    \tab     \tab (8) \tab repairs to low pressure heating plants with a capacity of less than fifteen pounds per square inch, except as may otherwise be required by rule, regulation, directive, or bulletin of the commissioner\ul ;\ulnone\par
    \tab     \tab\ul (9) \ulnone\tab\ul installation of ten or fewer outlets for:\ulnone\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri144\sl480\slmult1\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx3168     \tab     \tab     \tab\ul (i)   \ulnone\tab\ul receptacles on a general purpose or appliance branch circuit;\ulnone\par
    \tab     \tab     \tab\ul (ii)  \ulnone\tab\ul electrical fixtures; or\ulnone\par
    \tab     \tab     \tab\ul (iii) \ulnone\tab\ul local switches;\ulnone\par
    \tab     \tab\ul (10)\ulnone\tab\ul installation of motors of fractional horsepower;\ulnone\par
    \tab     \tab\ul (11)\ulnone\tab\ul installation of transformers rated at one thousand volt amperes or less.\ulnone\par
    \tab\'a72. \tab This local law shall take effect ninety days after its enactment.\par
\par
    \tab Referred to the Committee on Housing and Building.\par
